price: نو هغوى لره چې ايمان يې راوړى او سم كارونه يې كړي بخښنه او عزتمنه روزي ده.
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
